definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="59" y="-36"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="2"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%).
